message:
Warning at 300 requests per minute means we could be sending on average 5 requests per second. We are half way to our limit. 
More info and instructions on resolving:
https://joinhandshake.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/DA/pages/865566925/Education+Incident+Runbooks#EducationIncidentRunbooks-LookerScheduledPlanRunOnceWarning/ReportScheduleTestEmailFailing


@slack-incidents-edu,@slack-incidents-te-analytics-int
name: Run Schedule Plan Once request usage is high
